uk.co.sevendigital.android.sdk.util

Class VolleyUtil.BitmapLruCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.util.LruCache<java.lang.String,android.graphics.Bitmap>
      • uk.co.sevendigital.android.sdk.util.VolleyUtil.BitmapLruCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.android.volley.toolbox.ImageLoader.ImageCache
    Enclosing class:
    VolleyUtil

    public static class VolleyUtil.BitmapLruCache
extends android.support.v4.util.LruCache<java.lang.String,android.graphics.Bitmap>
implements com.android.volley.toolbox.ImageLoader.ImageCache
    The VolleyUtil.BitmapLruCache is an implementation of ImageLoader.ImageCache that stores bitmaps (in memory) to a maximum number of bytes.

    • Constructor Summary

      protected int sizeOf(java.lang.String key, android.graphics.Bitmap value)
      Returns the size of the entry for key and value in user-defined units.

    • Method Detail

      • sizeOf

        protected int sizeOf(java.lang.String key,
                     android.graphics.Bitmap value)
        Description copied from class: android.support.v4.util.LruCache
        Returns the size of the entry for key and value in user-defined units. The default implementation returns 1 so that size is the number of entries and max size is the maximum number of entries.

        An entry's size must not change while it is in the cache.

        Overrides:
        sizeOf in class android.support.v4.util.LruCache<java.lang.String,android.graphics.Bitmap>
